statements: DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Example Supplier';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplies';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'XYZ Corporation' AND supplier_contact = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Inc';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 101 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Orders WHERE total_order_amount > 10000);
DELETE FROM Products WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'Acme%');

DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
DELETE FROM Products WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier ABC');
